name: Back to the roots (Colinkilli)
description:
" It is a beautiful day when suddenly an army of robots from the future appears !

It must probably be one of your clumsy future descendant who mess up the future !!

Defend yourself, the destiny of your descendants depend on it !! "

In this game you will inpersonate your ancestors up to the roots of your familly tree. At every stage success, the robot from the future decide to take down someone weaker in your ancestors . Defend yourself , the destiny of your descendants depend on it.

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/back-roots-4
